resources.string: Unable to sign in.\nPlease check your Email address, password and the Internet connection.
Unable to sign in.\nPlease check the Internet connection.
Unable to register.\nPlease check the Internet connection.
Invalid Email.\nPlease make sure that you typed a correct Email address.
Too short password.\nAt least 8 characters are needed for a password.
Password and Verify don\'t match.\nPlease check they\'re the same.
